ygData.subject: Re: Cantera installation problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Thomas, I ran into the same problem and it was because I had not run the executable in the Cantera folder (something like Cantera-1.6.0win32-py2.4) that is

Hi Thomas,

I ran into the same problem and it was because I had not run th=
e 
executable in the Cantera folder (something like 
Cantera-1.6.0win32-py2=
.4) that is generated by installing Cantera.

Good luck,
Nick
